location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter no.5490 of 1852 from Arthur Malet, Chief Secretary to the Government Bombay, to Captain Arnold Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf

mods.abstract: Malet acknowledges the receipt of Kemball's previous letter (f 162), stating that the Governor in Council sees no reason in implementing harsher punitive measures against the Arab chiefs as punishment for disturbances of the maritime peace.
